kou commented on pull request #6658: ARROW-8153: [Packaging] Update the conda feedstock files and upload artifacts to Anaconda
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6658#discussion_r394694025
 
 

 ##########
 File path: dev/tasks/conda-recipes/azure.linux.yml
 ##########
 @@ -52,3 +54,8 @@ jobs:
     env:
       CROSSBOW_GITHUB_TOKEN: $(CROSSBOW_GITHUB_TOKEN)
     displayName: Upload packages as a GitHub release
+
+  # Upload to custom anaconda channel
+  - script: |
+      anaconda -t $(CROSSBOW_ANACONDA_TOKEN) upload -l nightly --force build_artifacts/linux-64/*.tar.bz2

   https://dev.azure.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=8372&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=3367cfe7-6aa5-5a88-c888-e6814d74f6eb&l=16

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
The windows builds were failing, so the feedstock files must be updated.

Under the same hat add support for uploading the produced artifacts to Anaconda labeled as nightly.
fields.summary: [Packaging] Update the conda feedstock files and upload artifacts to Anaconda
